Posts.Content: Aug 28, 2013 12:25PM ML40 wrote: I was diagnosed last month. I decided for the less invasive surgery and did not opt for the mastectomy, BUT what was helpful for me was I was told over & over again by my surgeon & others that it is YOUR choice and what makes you comfortable.
Posts.Title: Just diagnosed and Lumpectomy early next week Shira CTMOM1234
